DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study investigate therapeutic potential breathe 100 % oxygen acute migraine headache .
DOC.brief_title: Normobaric Oxygen ( NBO ) Therapy Acute Migraine
DOC.detailed_description: A total 40 adult subject enrol , male female . Subjects consent inhale either Normobaric Oxygen ( NBO ) Room air 30 minute start migraine attack . Outcomes assess gas treatment .
DOC.criteria: Adult subject frequent migraine ( least 1 attack per month ) Secondary ( nonmigraine ) headache Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Pregnant
